record.title: HOUR OF MEETING ON THURSDAY, APRIL 17, 2008
record.narrative:
HOUR OF MEETING ON THURSDAY, APRIL 17, 2008 -- (House of Representatives - April 10, 2008)

[Page: H2209]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns on Wednesday, April 16, 2008, it adjourn to meet at 8:30 a.m. on Thursday, April 17.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
